Class RaftNode.BuildReply

  • java.lang.Object
    • RaftNode.BuildReply
  • Enclosing class:
    RaftNode
    public class RaftNode.BuildReply
extends java.lang.Object
    receiver implementations for ReqVoteArgs and AppendEntriesArgs This inner class is a combination of Receiver Implementation for
    1. AppendEntries RPC (§5.1 §5.3)
    2. RequestVote RPC (§5.1 §5.2 §5.4)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BuildReply()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isLegal​(AppendEntriesArgs request)
      AppendEntries RPC - Receiver Implementation - #3: check for seeting success reply false if log does not contain an entry at prevLogIndex whose term matches prevLogTerm(§ 5.3) reply false if exiting entry conflicts with a new one(§ 5.3)
      Message replyToApdEntriesArgs​(Message message)
      Receiver implementation to AppendEntries RPC(§5.1 §5.3) the AppendEntries can be a Leader Log list or empty(heartbeat)
      Message replyToReqVoteArgs​(Message message)
      Receiver implementation to RequestVote RPC(§5.1 §5.2 §5.4)
      boolean requirementsToGrantVote​(RequestVoteArgs request)
      The judgement for setting VoteGranted, if the candidate's log is at least up-to-date as local og(§5.2 §5.4)

    • Method Detail

      • replyToReqVoteArgs

        public Message replyToReqVoteArgs​(Message message)
        Receiver implementation to RequestVote RPC(§5.1 §5.2 §5.4)
        Parameters:
        message - Message carring RequestVoteArgs(term,candidateId,lastLogIndex,lastLogTerm)
        Returns:
        Message carrying RequestVoteReply(term,voteGranted)

      • requirementsToGrantVote

        public boolean requirementsToGrantVote​(RequestVoteArgs request)
        The judgement for setting VoteGranted, if the candidate's log is at least up-to-date as local og(§5.2 §5.4)

        if VoteFor is null or candidateId and if Candidate's log is at least as up-to-date as receiver's log then voteGranted == true

        Parameters:
        request - to make judgement
        Returns:
        true if vote for the candidate, false if not

      • replyToApdEntriesArgs

        public Message replyToApdEntriesArgs​(Message message)
        Receiver implementation to AppendEntries RPC(§5.1 §5.3) the AppendEntries can be a Leader Log list or empty(heartbeat)
        Parameters:
        message - Message carring AppendEntriesArgs(term,leaderID, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, entries[], leaderCommit)
        Returns:
        Message carrying AppendEntriesReply(term,success)

      • isLegal

        public boolean isLegal​(AppendEntriesArgs request)

        AppendEntries RPC - Receiver Implementation - #3: check for seeting success reply false if log does not contain an entry at prevLogIndex whose term matches prevLogTerm(§ 5.3) reply false if exiting entry conflicts with a new one(§ 5.3)

        Parameters:
        request - AppendEntriesArgs request for checking
        Returns:
        true if is Legal, false if conflicted
